name: The Ancestor (GGJ 2023)
description:
Description

Death...famine...pestilence...Maurice. That's how the apocalypse happened, in that specific order. A group of survivors are trapped in a dangerous place called the "splouch ouch that was lava" Hills.

Among them was bob. He promised to take them to the safe zone (he was probably lying to be honest). Using his white round thingy, an ancestor retrieval device, bob has the power to control his ancestor bob to help them in their perilous mission to find Maurice.

Controls
  • Move: WASD / Arrows
  • Jump: Space
  • Change Time: Left Click / E
  • Dialogue: F
